title: 金锭勋章Get~撒一点锭
author: xiaoma636
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaoma636 于 2016-10-13 12:09 编辑 

嗯，如题，楼主终于拿到金锭勋章啦

勋章数也终于突破了一排
好难，噗（容我吐个血）
金块勋章怎么办（我已经是条咸鱼了）

那么撒锭，啦啦啦
刚换了勋章，锭不多，就不AT了
先到先得啦~

{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_yellow:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:wool_colored_black:}{:glass:}{:glass:}{:glass:}{:glass:}{:glass:}{:glass:}{:glass:}
